issue.title: [CF 137] Holy Word multi-state cooldown
issue.body:
Using TellMeWhen 4.0.0 beta6

I have had my holy word: chastise spell set up as a multi-state ability cooldown (for the different chakra states) and it has been working fine until recently.

The only way I am able to get it to work now is to use the spell ID 88625 instead of typing the name.


> Posted by CurseForge user hobbes311 | Imported from CurseForge issue #137 | Raw

comments.body:
Fixed in beta7, sorry.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
